message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this great product to you today. I think it would be perfect for your needs. I'm asking for $120 to start. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $120 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $60. Can you meet me in the middle at $90?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  $60 is quite low, though. How about we split the difference and call it $100?
I appreciate the compromise, but $100 is still a bit steep. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so how about $85?
